text: 9Tau 7ru TTyTHTff yifea<ut T Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 4} (w36 Qae7 ak <Hf FFK4) W4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 {I R1 #T National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 41-5 V 6, #427 10, GTts], 78 Rcd) 110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/217/2007-Admn Dated: 22.09.2014 Matters: Administration/Finance (148 /2014) (Decision taken in File No NHAL/11041/08/2010-HRI(Pt)) Sub: Obtaining undertaking from officers and employees of NHAI (including deputationist and long-term/short-term contract employees) Please find enclosed a copy of letter No. C-13019/17/2011-Vig dated 3.7.2014 received from JS &CVO; MoRT&H relating to disclosure of information  regarding employment/interest of close relative in any company or firm for compliance 2_ In this connection, a Matters  ~Administration/Finance (116/2013) dated 23.05.2013 on the above subject was issued wherein all officers and employees of NHAI (including deputationist and long-term/short-term contract employees) were directed to give a undertaking at the time of joining/during tenure in NHAI about their non- dependent or dependent parents/brothers/sisters/wife/sons/daughters (including step sons and daughters)/other blood relations/ in laws and other relatives having interest in any work of NHAI to avoid conflict of interest: 3, All concerned are Once again  informed about  disclosure of  information in compliance with above guidelines in prescribed proforma in case any of his dependent or non dependent relative(s) (as defined in para 2 above) takes up employment in a company or firm or is interested in any such company or firm in any other manner 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: 2 1 (V.K Sharma) Chief General Manager (LA & Coord:) To; All officers and employees of HQROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices NHAI Policy Policy
